scripts.lint: npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint
scripts.clean: npm run clean:esm && npm run clean:cjs && npm run clean:umd && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:bin && npm run clean:rel
scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:dist && npm run build:exe
scripts.build:sea: npm run build:sea:blob && npm run build:sea:cpnode && npm run build:sea:postject
scripts.build:sea:postject: npx postject bin/evectl-linux NODE_SEA_BLOB bin/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && chmod -w bin/evectl-linux
scripts.release: npm run tar && npm run zip
scripts.tar: npm run tar:linux && npm run tar:alpine && npm run tar:mac && npm run tar:win
scripts.tar:linux: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|evectl-linux|evectl|' -czvf rel/evectl-linux-x86.tar.gz evectl-linux
scripts.tar:alpine: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|evectl-alpine|evectl|' -czvf rel/evectl-alpine-x86.tar.gz evectl-alpine
scripts.tar:mac: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|evectl-macos|evectl|' -czvf rel/evectl-mac-x86.tar.gz evectl-macos
scripts.tar:win: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|evectl-win|evectl|' -czvf rel/evectl-win-x86.tar.gz evectl-win.exe
scripts.zip: npm run zip:linux && npm run zip:alpine && npm run zip:mac && npm run zip:win
scripts.zip:linux:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/evectl-linux-x86.zip bin/evectl-linux -j bin && printf '@ evectl-linux
@=evectl
' | zipnote -w rel/evectl-linux-x86.zip
scripts.zip:alpine:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/evectl-alpine-x86.zip bin/evectl-alpine -j bin && printf '@ evectl-alpine
@=evectl
' | zipnote -w rel/evectl-alpine-x86.zip
scripts.zip:mac:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/evectl-mac-x86.zip bin/evectl-macos -j bin && printf '@ evectl-macos
@=evectl
' | zipnote -w rel/evectl-mac-x86.zip
scripts.zip:win:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/evectl-win-x86.zip bin/evectl-win.exe -j bin && printf '@ evectl-win.exe
@=evectl.exe
' | zipnote -w rel/evectl-win-x86.zip
